name: Labyrinthum
description:
[Labyrinthum[/b] is an exciting labyrinth game offering a unique gaming experience combining puzzles, riddles and general knowledge challenges. As you make your way through a network of labyrinths, you'll have to use your wits and speed to reach the exit.



The game features 15 levels, each based on a different theme, gradually increasing in difficulty to provide a constant and stimulating challenge. To successfully navigate each labyrinth, you must solve visual puzzles and answer general knowledge questions that test your knowledge in a variety of areas.



But Labyrinthum is more than just a maze game. It also incorporates special tiles that add an extra layer of strategy to the game. Bonus tiles provide temporary advantages that can help you overcome particularly difficult obstacles. However, you also need to watch out for trap tiles that can complicate your progress, set you back or make the questions more complicated.



Labyrinthum is more than just a game, it's a journey through a series of stimulating challenges that will put your insight and perseverance to the test. Get ready to enter the labyrinth and meet the challenge!
